history.proof: intros a b nZb p q r canP canQ canR divAab. hauto l: on depth: 3.

original: intros a b nZb p q r canP canQ canR divAab. unfold spminusf, pluspf, plusA, eqA, eqA_dec, ltM, ltM_dec, minusA in *. remember (plusTerm plusA a b) as ab. assert (H1: eqP A eqA n (appTerm ab r) (appTerm ab (plusP A A0 eqA plusA n ltM p q))). { apply spminusf_plusTerm; auto. } assert (H2: eqP A eqA n (appTerm a (spminusf b nZb p r)) (appTerm b (spminusf b nZb q r))). { apply eqptail_spminusf_com; auto. } assert (H3: eqP A eqA n (spminusf a b nZb p r) (spminusf a b nZb q r)). { rewrite H2. reflexivity. } auto.
